subject: Missing Hardware with haptic VAM Pro order
description_text:
Hello,

I was trying to install my Simsonn VAM Pro haptic feedback modules to my
pedals when I noticed I was missing the M5-20mm bolts and M4-10mm bolts
indicated in the instruction manual. Can you please provide these parts.

Thanks,

conversations.body_text: Hi Brady,  Please take clear photos of all the products and screws/accessories you have received and send them to us. I will check them first and then arrange replacements for any missing items.Â
